description: Damien Moreau"The Masochist"Ht: 5'7" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Liam Harkmoore"Hardball"Ht: 5'8" WT: 140lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Brand new to Naked Kombat we have Liam "Hardball" Harkmoore challenging Damien "The Masochist" Moreau. The Masochist says his opponent is nothing but a little blonde bitch and he can't wait to bend him over for a fucking before covering his face in cum. Hardball has some wrestling experience and he's determined to put it to good use before having his way with The Masochist. As the match begins The Masochist charges at his opponent but is swept by Hardball as he slams his ass down to the ground. The Masochist tears away his opponents jock and pounces on top of him, shoving his ripped up jock right back in his mouth. Will The Masochist have to prove his name when Hardball punishes him in the sex round, or will it be Hardball who finds himself taking a "Hardcock" rammed up his ass?
title: Damien "The Masochist" Moreau vs Liam "Hardball" Harkmoore
